title: ETP breaks Teachable.com courses
content: ETP breaks Teachable.com courses. Specifically because the domain player.hotmart.com is blocked. But this domain itself isn't used for tracking. Hotmart uses tracking-api.hotmart.com for tracking. So ETP breaks all websites that serve their courses via Teachable and there is no workaround other than disabling ETP for that site. Please whitelist Hotmart and add tracking domain only.
creator: forkbun

title: how to remove pinned tab green new notification badge?
content:
Pinned tabs will show a green dot underneath logo when firefox thinks it's changed. it never does, never has. gmail, closedAI, claude, notion, doesn't matter. it thinks the website changed. annyoing and distracting.

how to stop this?

Is there some setting in about:config that can deal with this?
creator: ACookieMonster

title: web page not loading properly
content: I have recently run into an issue with web page not loading correctly. over the last couple of weeks, after I sign on to my bank's web site, I get a screen with non-functioning buttons(see attached screenshot). I contacted the bank, and their instructions were to clear cookies and cache, close Firefox and re-open the browser, and this should clear up the problem; or, update the browser. my Firefox is the latest version 131.0.3. the issue still existed after performing these steps. I tried using MS Edge and all screens loaded correctly. Firefox is my browser of choice, and I have not had this issue previously. please respond with feedback, so I know how to move forward. thank you.
creator: cvaughn1010
